Detailed Description

This class implements a GraphicsSetting that calls into python when its option is changed.

The callback takes one parameter, which is the newly selected option for this graphics setting.

Member Function Documentation

void PyCallbackGraphicsSetting::onOptionSelected ( int  optionIndex  )  [virtual]

This method is called by the Graphics Settings system when our setting is changed.

The newly selected option is passed in.

Parameters:
optionIndex The newly selected option in our graphics setting.

Implements Moo::GraphicsSetting.
